entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.0°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or freezing rain this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Flurries beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 6:47 PM MST Friday 20 January 2023
